questions.question: This arc focuses on the backstory of Sanji and his connections to the Vinsmoke Family. What is...?
In this arc, the Straw Hat Pirates face a challenge against a Warlord of the Sea known for his ability to turn people into toys. What is...?
This arc is set on an island under the sea, where the Straw Hat Pirates learn about the history of the Fish-Man race. What is...?
This form of Haki allows the user to predict an opponent's moves and sense their presence, even if they are hidden. What is...?
This technique, utilized by Sanji, sets his leg on fire, enhancing the power of his kicks. What is...?
This technique, used by a certain pirate captain, involves creating a giant spectral elephant. What is...?
questions.answer: Zou Zou no Mi, Model: Mammoth

questions.question: This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled swordsman who wields three swords and aspires to become the world's greatest swordsman. Who is...?
This former member of the Royal Shichibukai is known for their Snake-Snake Fruit powers and role as the queen of Amazon Lily. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a reindeer with the ability to transform into different forms using the Human-Human Fruit. Who is...?
